texts.ru: Угулой жительница Шахритусского района. Ей сорок лет. Она вдова. У нее один ребенок. Угулой занимается торговлей на рынке. Она в основном занимается торговлей детской одежды. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 12 лет. В торговле ей помогает ее сын. Она берет кредит для приобретения сезонного товара детям подросткового возраста.
texts.en: Uguloy lives in the Shahrituz region. She is forty years old. She is a widow with one child. Uguloy sells goods in the market, primarily children's clothing. She has been in this line of work for 12 years. Her son helps her with her work. She is asking for a loan to purchase seasonal goods for teenagers.

loans.use: Purchase seasonal clothing for teenagers.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha sells assorted canned goods, medicines and other items to earn a living and has had this business for two years. She is 46 years old and lives in Cang-apa, Larena, Siquijor. Editha is married with two children. Each month, she earns 4,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store. 

Editha has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for 10 months. Editha hopes to repair her house with the profit from her small business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Daisy Jane

texts.en:
Daisy Jane is 18 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with one child. Daisy Jane has a retail shop that sells snacks, beverages and canned goods. She has had this business for one year. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Daisy Jane is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Daisy Jane hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
This is 25-year-old Alfred. He is married and has one child, age 2. In 2004, Alfred established his used cap business. He began his business because he dropped out of school and was convinced that business can be a source of income to support his family. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about 1,200,000 leones (SLL) every month from this business. 

Alfred would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL. Alfred has already received and successfully repaid two loans and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional used caps for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 230,000 SLL. In the future, Alfred plans to finish building his house. He used the proceeds of his previous loan to buy a motor bike.

Alfred thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy used caps for his business

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталия замужем. Они с мужем живут в небольшом городке под названием Виноградово в Западной Украине. Наталия занимается продажей косметики. Ее торговая точка находится в самом центре городка, конкуренция практически отсутствует. Наталия занимается этим видом торговли уже около 6 лет. На данный момент у нее в товаре находится около 45 000 гривен, а доход составляет 6 000 гривен. 

КИВА кредит в размере 10 000 гривен Наталия планирует использовать для того, чтобы закупить новые парфюмерные изделия для продажи в своем магазинчике. Она хотела бы приобрести более новые и дорогие духи и туалетную воду по оптовой цене, чтобы разнообразить предлагаемый ею ассортимент товара. Цель Наталии – расширить торговлю и продолжать развивать свое дело. 

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Nataliya is married. She and her husband live in a small town called Vinogradovo in western Ukraine. Nataliya sells cosmetics. Her shop is located in the heart of the city, with virtually no competition. Nataliya has been in business around 6 years. At this time, she has 45,000 hryvnia in inventory, with an income of 6,000 hryvnia. 

Nataliya is requesting a Kiva loan of 10,000 hryvnia in order to purchase new perfumes for her shop. She would like to purchase new and more expensive perfumes and eau de toilette at wholesale cost in order to diversify the range of products she offers. Nataliya's goal is to expand her inventory and further expand her business.

loans.use: purchase new perfumes to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is 24 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married. 

Albert has a shop that sells green and yellow bananas per kilogram. He has had this business for three years. He requested a loan of 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy green bananas to sell.

Albert is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Albert hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy green bananas to sell.

loans.name: Herminio

texts.en:
Herminio is single. He is 52 years old and lives in Cang-apa, Larena, Siquijor.  

Herminio is a farmer and grows vegetables to earn a living. He has been doing this for three years. He has requested a loan for 4,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to purchase seeds for vegetable gardening.

He has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for 10 months. Herminio hopes to expand his farmland.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for vegetable gardening

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлана замужем. У нее двое сыновей. Светлана живет в Мелитополе и торгует подростковой одеждой на местном Рижском рынке. Она занимается этим бизнесом уже 15 лет. У нее хороший опыт работы и умение правильно общаться с покупателями. У нее в товаре около 35 000 гривен. 

Светлана планирует использовать кредит в 20 000 гривен, чтобы закупить товар к школьному сезону, а именно школьные формы, блузки, брюки, юбки и т.д. Светлана целеустремленный предприниматель. Она привязана к своему бизнесу  и хочет вкладывать в его дальнейшее развитие и процветание.  

Пометка: история  на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en: Svetlana is married with two sons. She lives in Melitipol and sells teen clothing at the local market Riga. She's been in the business for 15 years. She has good work experience and communicates well with customers. She has around 35,000 in inventory. Svetlana is planning to use a loan of 20,000 hryvnia to purchase goods for the school season, namely school uniforms, blouses, pants, skirts, etc. Svetlana is a driven entrepreneur. She is devoted to her business and wants to invest in its further development and prosperity.

loans.use: purchase goods for the school season, in particular, school uniforms, blouses, pants, skirts, etc.

loans.name: Sergey

texts.ru:
Сергей женат, у него с супругой один ребенок. Сергей живет и работает в Бердянске. Он торгует разнообразным товаром на центральном рынке своего родного города, а именно он продает постельное белье, нижнее белье, тапочки, туалетную бумагу, полотенца и т.д. Торговля у Сергея всегда идет хорошо, его цены ниже, чем у конкурентов, а торговое место расположено в очень удачном месте для работы. Этим бизнесом Сергей занимается уже 3 года. Его оборотный капитал составляет 20 000 гривен, а доход – примерно 10 000 гривен. 

Сергею необходим кредит в 15 000 гривен, чтобы пополнить ассортимент товара и закупить дополнительные комплекты постельного белья и полотенца. Он надеется продолжать вкладывать полученные средства в развитие своего бизнеса и дальше. Сергей честный предприниматель, который с профессионализмом относится к своему делу и его предприимчивость помогает ему в этом. 

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en: Sergey is married and has one child with his wife. Sergey lives and works in Berdyansk. He sells a variety of goods in his hometown's central market, in particular, bed linens, underwear, slippers, toilet paper, towels, etc. Sergey's products look good, his prices are lower than his competitors' and his retail space is in an excellent location. Sergey has been in business 3 years. He has 20,000 hryvnia in current assets and his income is around 10,000 hryvnia. Sergey is asking for a loan of 15,000 hyrvnia to add to the range of his products and to purchase more sets of towels and bed linens. He hopes to continue investing his profits in growing his business further. Sergey is an honest businessman whose entrepreneurial spirit has helped him to approach his work with professionalism.

loans.use: increase the variety of his goods and purchase sets of bed linens and towels.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. Rebecca has a retail shop that sells coconuts for copra. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy coconut for copra. Rebecca is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy coconuts for copra

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Сайёра проживает в районе Кубодиён. Возраст, 34 года. Она разведена. У нее двое детей. Сайёра имеет среднее образование. Он у себя дома разводит крупнорогатый скот. В основном она разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается восемь лет. Кредит берет для закупа двух голов бычков.
texts.en: Sayora lives in the Qubadiyon region. She is 34 years old, divorced and has two children. Sayora has secondary education. She breeds large horned cattle at home. She mainly breeds it for future sale. She has been in this business for eight years. Sayora is taking out the loan to buy two heads of calves.

loans.use: to buy two heads of calves

loans.name: Erna

texts.en: Erna is 52 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. Erna has a tailoring shop that repairs and sews office and school uniforms. She has had this business for four years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy materials needed for tailoring. Erna is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Erna hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy material needed for tailoring

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en:
Rogelio is 56 years old, a diligent father of seven children. He is a farmer working in the Philippines. 

To make living, Rogelio is engaged in a farming and hog raising business. He has run his hog raising business for almost 10 years. His wife is housekeeper and partner in managing their businesses.

Rogelio’s goal is to gain higher income from the business to further support his family's necessities. He wants to borrow a loan to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs. He believes that through the loan he can maintain his hog raising business and attain his goal.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs.

loans.name: Avelain

texts.en:
Avelain is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 3 children. 

Avelain has a food shop where she sells meats & snacks in a canteen. She has had this business for 3 years. She has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy raw ingredients for making snacks & meats.

Avelain is a new member of HSPFI. In the future,Avelain hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks & meats.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 52 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 

Leonila has a food shop where she sells home made ice creams. She has had this business for 2 years. She is requesting a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy raw ingredients for making home made ice cream.

Leonila is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Leonila hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making home made ice cream.

loans.name: Hanny

texts.en:
Hanny is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 3 children. 

Hanny has a retail shop where she sells used clothing or ukay-ukay. She has had this business for 3 years. She has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of used clothing or ukay-ukay.

Hanny is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Hanny hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of used clothing or ukay-ukay.
